undamental for your business, but if it’s not done carefully, you may be getting wrong information without even being aware of it.

Sales Intelligence (S.I.) softwares allow for real-time analyses of sales data. These softwares use proxies to scrape the web for information. The insights you get, if accurate, can improve your sales process.
